summary.originalText: One of the best movie of 2025

originalText.plaidHtml:
One of the best movie of 2025, this will be in my top 10 ranking list of 2025 best direction writing and screenplay one of the best music and best acting specially Akshay Khanna movie runtime is 3 hour and approx 30 minute but I not get bor for a single minute and the story telling is just wow, they used real footage of terrorist and their attacks,
I really recommend this movie to everyone how entertaining interesting is this.

summary.originalText: One of the Best movie of this year , Hatts of to Mr Aditya dhar

originalText.plaidHtml:
1) presentation was so good that didn't felt bored at all.

Providing chapters like that was great idea

2) casting was perfect that u love the actors ( not the real life Terrorists) -> Ranveer singh's best performance especially during that Mumbai scene -> Akshay khanna has so much aura that he overshadowed Others in those scene where other actors were there -> arjun rampal's natural acting was epic ...felt the terror -> Madhavan ka looks , praise the make artist All actors gave their peak best performance

3) Aditya dhar gave the impact.

After seeing the aura and dynamics of akshay khanna I was Rooting for him , later during that horrific scene of 26/11 We has audience shifted back to root Ranveer.

Felt releaved when rehman died .

4) cinematography and music , hits hard due to which we enjoyed every scene. Best use of real footage with creative liberty.

5) story progression was so good that I real felt how would this progress from this point of the movie..

summary.originalText: A Raw, Intense, and Riveting Action Saga with Strong Emotional Undercurrents

originalText.plaidHtml: "Dhurandhar" is a gritty, hard-hitting action drama that thrives on intensity, scale, and powerful performances, delivering an engaging cinematic experience from start to finish. The film blends high-octane action with a layered emotional narrative, exploring themes of loyalty, revenge, and the cost of violence.

summary.originalText: Amazing and finally a True Spy thrillers that India needed

originalText.plaidHtml: THE MOVIE SCREENTIME IS 3+ hours but the direction and final cut is such that you dont get bored, does not seem stretched and you are always engaged in the storyline. Beautiful work by Ranveer sing to carry out such a role with all the prep. Akshay khanna was tremendous in the never seen before avatar. Sanjay dutt and Arjun Rampal have killed it in the villain roles and you are bound to hate them in such crafted and goated art piece of their acting. R Madhavan has very less screentime but gives Justice to Ajay sanyal role.

summary.originalText: Movie that keeps you on toes

originalText.plaidHtml:
Unbelievable acting from star cast, great storyline based on true events, can't wait to watch again!

Loved the direction, it is worth the hype of extraordinary.

Since the movie is more than 3 hour long, it's totally worth it in mang senses.

Akshay khanna's aura and Ranvir Singh's acting in best in the class.

summary.originalText: One of the finest Movie of Indian Cinema

originalText.plaidHtml:
Every actor has done justice to the character they have played... No disappointment, no unnecessary drama, pure storyline, pure acting and nothing... And the testosterone rush is like cherry on the top..

But this movie is not for weak hearted persons and please don't go theater with your children..

Kudos to Aditya Dhar.

summary.originalText: Flawless execution, incredible and powerful story

originalText.plaidHtml: Extraordinary film. Songs were good, direction is good and acting is top notch by everyone. Aditya sir has chosen very powerful cast for the roles. They portrayed everything naturally. Though it's a very long run time in recent years, it never felt bored until the end. More goosebumps scenes are present in the entire film, loved it.

summary.originalText: Durandar is a gripping and power-packed entertainer

originalText.plaidHtml:
I watched Durandar today, and I absolutely loved it. The entire star cast has delivered a fabulous performance. Akshaye Khanna, in particular, is on another level-his role and acting are truly exceptional. Ranveer Singh is outstanding as well; more than his performance, it's his striking look and screen presence that elevate the film.

The background score deserves a special mention. It adds intensity throughout and gives you goosebumps in almost every scene. I honestly didn't find anything that justifies labeling it as an "adult" film.

Overall, Durandar is a gripping and power-packed entertainer. I'm eagerly waiting for its sequel!

originalText.plaidHtml: Great movie great cast this is the different and unique kind of cinematography which is been played in screen it have set a next level threshold for upcoming films and really i felt like every thing is happening for real and i m in it and i really expect a lot from sequel as well really a must watch film and I recommend every individual to experience this film inside theatre to experience the book of 10 Chapters based on true events written and directed excellently by Sir Aditya Dhar .

summary.originalText: DHURANDHAR HAS SET THE BAR HIGH FOR ESPIONAGE THRILLERSüí•üí•

originalText.plaidHtml: One of the finest espionage spy film maker from the technical point of view as well as the entertainment value is so high with exceptional performances by an ensemble cast. The screenplay is very tight and gripping and the film is well made and I have to say the background music and score was so on point and detailed. All in all the film is worth every penny.

summary.originalText: Best spy movie

originalText.plaidHtml: A well made movie directed by Aditya dhar . The performance of all actors makes it more great .top acting with great screenplay and direction üëç.want to see more and eagerly waiting for next part hope people recognise the real talent and support this movie. Better than War 2 and pathaan in storytelling and believable action choreography.

summary.originalText: Exceptionally detailed espionage movie

originalText.plaidHtml:
I watched Dhurandhar today and I found it to be very good. Ranveer acting with the eyes was exceptional, Akshay Khanna with his swag and that wry smile nailed it, Arjun Rampal was spine chilling with his voice modulation and subtle gestures, and Sanju Baba was what Sanju used to do earlier. Madhavan in a fragmented appearance was expressive with his eyes and facial features. The side actors were also good specially Rakesh Bedi and the actor who played Donga (who played Ranbir's boss in Rocket Singh).

The set design, production, and the colour grading was brilliant. The amount of research that has gone into this is awesome. Cinematography and Direction and the sets of Lyari town along with Ranveer, Akshaye and Arjun made this movie and exceptional watch for me. The only downside was the bit predictability in the screenplay and the editing was slack, the movie could have been cut by 15 minutes.

But do watch Dhurandhar, this is what an espionage movie should be. Eagerly waiting for 19th March, 2026.

summary.originalText: Cinema with courage- A story india needed to Hear

originalText.plaidHtml:
Dhurandhar is an emotionally shattering masterpiece that exposes the painful sacrifices our spies make to protect our nation. This is not a YRF film, and making a film like this is definitely not their cup of tea - it needs a fearless creator with courage and conviction.

Aditya Dhar, you absolutely nailed it. The film honestly reveals uncomfortable truths and highlights how political negligence and poor leadership in the past led to losses and suffering for our brave heroes. It powerfully portrays how the system failed them and how the country paid the price.

There are strong moments that show how decisions taken during earlier governments affected national security, and how our soldiers and spies were left to bear the consequences. It opens the eyes of the public to realities that were hidden or ignored.

The storytelling shakes your soul - raw, real and unforgettable.

This is not just a movie - it's a tribute to the unsung warriors of India.

A must-watch for every Indian. Salute to our real heroes. üáÆüá≥

summary.originalText: Dhurandhar Movie

originalText.plaidHtml: Dhurandhar is a blockbuster that has taken the box office by storm and firmly established itself as a massive commercial success. From its powerful storytelling to its high-impact performances, the film has connected strongly with audiences across regions and age groups. Packed theaters, repeat viewings, and overwhelming word of mouth clearly prove its blockbuster status. Dhurandhar delivers grand-scale entertainment, memorable moments, and strong emotional resonance, making it a complete cinematic experience. Critics and fans alike have praised its execution, and its record-breaking collections confirm that Dhurandhar is not just a hit, but a true blockbuster that will be remembered for years to come.

summary.originalText: Powerful Performances with Action Galore

originalText.plaidHtml: From start to finish, the film masterfully intertwines emotional depth with high-stakes action. Ranveer Singh navigates the complexities of his character with finesse, while Sanjay Dutt commands attention with gravitas. Akshaye Khanna and R Madhavan provide nuanced support, Arjun Rampal exudes quiet menace, and Sara Arjun delivers poignant emotional moments. Aditya Dhar's direction ensures that tension escalates naturally, balancing suspense, strategy, and physical action. Cinematography captures both intimate and epic moments, while the soundscape enhances suspense. The finale delivers both adrenaline and emotional payoff, leaving viewers thoroughly engaged.

summary.originalText: DHURANDHAR: A Roar of the Nation's Conscience

originalText.plaidHtml:
DHURANDHAR is not merely a film-it is a declaration. Rooted in the spirit of the soil and driven by an unflinching sense of duty, the movie channels a powerful nationalist fervor that resonates long after the screen fades to black. It speaks in the language of sacrifice, resolve, and unwavering belief in the idea of the nation.

At its core, DHURANDHAR celebrates the strength of character that defines true patriotism. The narrative moves with intensity, portraying individuals who rise above personal comfort to answer a larger call-one that demands courage, discipline, and moral clarity. Without resorting to hollow slogans, the film builds its nationalism through actions, choices, and consequences. This grounded approach makes the emotion feel earned and deeply authentic.

Visually, the film reinforces its message with strong compositions and an earthy palette that anchors the story in lived reality. The background score complements the mood, elevating moments of tension and pride without overpowering the narrative. Dialogues are sharp and purposeful, carrying the weight of conviction rather than theatrics.

What makes DHURANDHAR stand out is its refusal to romanticize nationalism superficially. Instead, it portrays patriotism as responsibility-towards land, people, and values. The characters are not flawless heroes; they are determined citizens shaped by struggle, loss, and an unbreakable sense of belonging. This human depth lends credibility to the film's ideological stance.

In a time when national identity is often reduced to noise, DHURANDHAR reminds us that the nation is built by silent perseverance and fearless action. It urges viewers to reflect on their own role within the collective, making the experience both stirring and introspective.

DHURANDHAR is a bold cinematic statement-raw, resolute, and deeply Indian. It stands tall as a film that doesn't just entertain, but ignites pride and responsibility in equal measure.

summary.originalText: Absolutely Magic

originalText.plaidHtml:
While some critics argue the film is narratively crowded and occasionally indulgence-heavy, particularly with its "To be continued..." cliffhanger, the emotional stakes remain high. Supporting actors like Sanjay Dutt, R. Madhavan, and a standout Rakesh Bedi add significant depth to the political landscape.

Ultimately, Dhurandhar is a "paisa vasool" theatrical experience that rewards patient viewers with a sophisticated, textured look at the cost of espionage. It sets a massive stage for its sequel, Revenge, slated for March 19, 2026, leaving audiences both exhausted and eager for more. For fans of grounded, high-stakes cinema, it is an absolute must-watch.

summary.originalText: After Ages

originalText.plaidHtml: A bollywood comeback? Maybe. Phenomenal. The script writing,character improvising,Story telling is just on point I am not indian nor am I talking about any aspects this movie presents but after a very long time bollywood has produced a movie that is perfect from every aspect according to me. Kudos to the writers and directors!

summary.originalText: A High-Stakes Tale of Heroes and Hurt

originalText.plaidHtml: The director's vision is evident in the seamless integration of complex political and underworld elements into a coherent story. Action sequences are choreographed with precision, dialogue delivery is natural, and the emotions hit hard without ever feeling forced. Cinematography and background score amplify the actors' performances, making their struggles and triumphs palpable.

summary.originalText: Love dhurandhar

originalText.plaidHtml: I really enjoyed Dhurandhar. R Madhavan as Ajit Doval was outstanding and carried the film with a calm but powerful presence. Ranveer Singh as the unknown man added the perfect touch of mystery that kept the tension alive. Full credit to director and producer Aditya Dhar for bringing this vision to life with such precision. The film stays engaging from start to finish and is absolutely worth watching.

summary.originalText: A Sharp, Intense, and Star-Fueled Drama

originalText.plaidHtml: Tension simmers under every frame, building a palpable sense of danger that never relents. The lead's performance is electrifying, delivering moments of raw vulnerability alongside calculated ruthlessness. Action sequences are cinematic feats of choreography, grounded in realism and narrative relevance. Supporting cast members are richly layered, bringing depth and texture to the story world. Cinematography excels in portraying both intimate moments and large-scale set pieces with equal finesse. The score amplifies suspense and emotional resonance, enhancing every pivotal scene. Political intrigue and underworld connections are intricately woven, adding stakes and realism. Every scene contributes to an overarching sense of tension that culminates in a climax both thrilling and emotionally satisfying.

summary.originalText: Awesome

originalText.plaidHtml:
Dhurandhar is an absolutely awesome movie that keeps you hooked from the very first scene. The film combines powerful performances, gripping storytelling, and a dark, intense atmosphere that pulls you straight into its world. Ranveer Singh delivers one of his most controlled and impressive roles, while Akshaye Khanna completely steals the show with his commanding presence.

The movie's scale, background score, and action scenes make it a true big-screen experience. Every chapter feels engaging, and the tension never really drops. Even though the film is long, it rarely feels boring because each moment adds something meaningful to the narrative.

What makes Dhurandhar stand out is its boldness. It's not a typical masala film - it's raw, gritty, emotional, and surprisingly immersive. If you enjoy intense thrillers with strong characters and a solid storyline, this one delivers everything you'd hope for. An excellent, must-watch movie.
